languages.text: Новым Наместником Футфола стала Октавиана, спонсируемая Миссией Касбаллики. Все, кто оспаривал ее лидерство, погибли в несчастном случае, когда прометийные баки "Адептус Амасекус" внезапно сдетонировали в ходе переговоров криминальных главарей о будущем станции. Октавиана уцелела, покинув корабль за несколько минут до взрыва по счастливой случайности. Новый бар она открыла на астероиде, ранее известном как Дворец Наместника.

With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.
languages.original_text: Новым Наместником Футфола стала Октавиана, спонсируемая Миссией Касбаллики. Все, кто оспаривал ее лидерство, погибли в несчастном случае, когда прометийные баки "Адептус Амасекус" внезапно сдетонировали в ходе переговоров криминальных главарей о будущем станции. Октавиана уцелела, покинув корабль за несколько минут до взрыва по счастливой случайности. Новый бар она открыла на астероиде, ранее известном как Дворец Наместника.

traits.locale_text: Sponsored by Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became a new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium containers of Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated during the crime lords' negotiations about the future of the station. Octaviana was unharmed, as she left the ship several minutes before the explosion by pure chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as Liege's Palace.

All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

languages.text: 在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的赞助下，奥克塔维娜成为了落脚港新任总督。所有反对她领导的人都在某场意外中丧生。当时，那些犯罪头目来到了艾玛赛克烈酒修会，准备就星站的未来进行谈判，但酒吧中的钷素罐突然爆炸，所有人都当场丧命，而奥克塔维娜却安然无恙，因为她在爆炸的几分钟前刚好离开了那艘废船……这绝对只是个巧合。在那之后，她在那颗曾被称为总督府的小行星上开了间新的酒吧。
languages.original_text: With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

traits.locale_text: 在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的赞助下，奥克塔维娜成为了落脚港新任总督。所有反对她领导的人都在某场意外中丧生。当时，那些犯罪头目来到了艾玛赛克烈酒修会，准备就星站的未来进行谈判，但酒吧中的钷素罐突然爆炸，所有人都当场丧命，而奥克塔维娜却安然无恙，因为她在爆炸的几分钟前刚好离开了那艘废船……这绝对只是个巧合。在那之后，她在那颗曾被称为总督府的小行星上开了间新的酒吧。

languages.text: Mit der Unterstützung der Kasballica-Mission wurde Octaviana zur neuen Lehnsherrin von Footfall. Alle, die sich gegen ihre Herrschaft aussprachen, kamen bei einem tragischen Unfall ums Leben, als im Adeptus Amasecus plötzlich Promethium-Kanister explodierten — mitten in Verhandlungen zwischen Verbrecherbossen über die Zukunft der Station. Octaviana blieb unverletzt. Sie hatte das Schiff wenige Minuten vor der Explosion verlassen ... rein zufällig. Sie eröffnete bald darauf eine neue Bar auf einem Asteroiden, der zuvor als Palast des Lehnsherren bekannt gewesen war.
languages.original_text: With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

traits.locale_text: Mit der Unterstützung der Kasballica-Mission wurde Octaviana zur neuen Lehnsherrin von Footfall. Alle, die sich gegen ihre Herrschaft aussprachen, kamen bei einem tragischen Unfall ums Leben, als im Adeptus Amasecus plötzlich Promethium-Kanister explodierten — mitten in Verhandlungen zwischen Verbrecherbossen über die Zukunft der Station. Octaviana blieb unverletzt. Sie hatte das Schiff wenige Minuten vor der Explosion verlassen ... rein zufällig. Sie eröffnete bald darauf eine neue Bar auf einem Asteroiden, der zuvor als Palast des Lehnsherren bekannt gewesen war.

languages.text: Soutenue par la Mission de la Kasballica, Octaviana devint la nouvelle suzeraine de Castel. Tous ceux qui s'opposaient à son autorité furent tués lorsque des barils de prométhium explosèrent accidentellement à bord de l'Adeptus Amasecus, lors de négociations entre des barons du crime à propos de l'avenir de la station. Octaviana en sortit indemne, car elle avait quitté le vaisseau quelques minutes avant l'explosion... par pur hasard. Elle ouvrit ensuite un nouveau bar sur l'astéroïde précédemment connu sous le nom de palais du suzerain.
languages.original_text: With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

traits.locale_text: Soutenue par la Mission de la Kasballica, Octaviana devint la nouvelle suzeraine de Castel. Tous ceux qui s'opposaient à son autorité furent tués lorsque des barils de prométhium explosèrent accidentellement à bord de l'Adeptus Amasecus, lors de négociations entre des barons du crime à propos de l'avenir de la station. Octaviana en sortit indemne, car elle avait quitté le vaisseau quelques minutes avant l'explosion... par pur hasard. Elle ouvrit ensuite un nouveau bar sur l'astéroïde précédemment connu sous le nom de palais du suzerain.

languages.text: Con el apoyo de la misión Kasballica, Octaviana se convirtió en la nueva Señora de Paso. Todos los que se opusieron a su liderazgo murieron en un accidente en el Adeptus Amasecus, donde explotaron unos bidones de prometio en mitad de las negociaciones entre jefes criminales sobre el futuro de la estación. Octaviana resultó ilesa. Había abandonado la nave unos minutos antes de la explosión... por pura suerte. Abrió un nuevo bar en un asteroide antes conocido como el palacio del Señor.
languages.original_text: With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

traits.locale_text: Con el apoyo de la misión Kasballica, Octaviana se convirtió en la nueva Señora de Paso. Todos los que se opusieron a su liderazgo murieron en un accidente en el Adeptus Amasecus, donde explotaron unos bidones de prometio en mitad de las negociaciones entre jefes criminales sobre el futuro de la estación. Octaviana resultó ilesa. Había abandonado la nave unos minutos antes de la explosión... por pura suerte. Abrió un nuevo bar en un asteroide antes conocido como el palacio del Señor.

languages.text: カスバリカ聖務団がスポンサーとなり、オクタヴィアナはフットフォールの新たな領主となった。ステーションの将来について犯罪王たちが交渉している最中に、アデプトゥス・アマセックのプロメチウム缶が突然爆発したことで、彼女の指導に反対した者たちが全員事故死した。オクタヴィアナは無傷だった。彼女は爆発の数分前に船を離れていたのだ…偶然にも。彼女はかつて、総督の宮殿として知られていた小惑星で新しいバーを開いた。
languages.original_text: With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

traits.locale_text: カスバリカ聖務団がスポンサーとなり、オクタヴィアナはフットフォールの新たな領主となった。ステーションの将来について犯罪王たちが交渉している最中に、アデプトゥス・アマセックのプロメチウム缶が突然爆発したことで、彼女の指導に反対した者たちが全員事故死した。オクタヴィアナは無傷だった。彼女は爆発の数分前に船を離れていたのだ…偶然にも。彼女はかつて、総督の宮殿として知られていた小惑星で新しいバーを開いた。

languages.text: Kasballica Misyonu'nun arka çıktığı Octaviana, yeni Binliman Emîri oldu. Adeptus Amasekus'taki prometyum tenekeleri, suç baronlarının istasyonun geleceğine dair yaptıkları görüşmeler sırasında kazayla patlayınca onun liderliğine karşı çıkan herkes ölmüş oldu. Tesadüfen patlamadan birkaç dakika önce gemiden ayrılan Octaviana'ya ise bir şey oladı. Eskiden Emîr'in Sarayı olarak bilinen asteroitte yeni bir bar açtı.
languages.original_text: With the backing of the Kasballica Mission, Octaviana became the new Liege of Footfall. All those who opposed her leadership died in an accident when promethium canisters on the Adeptus Amasecus suddenly detonated in the middle of negotiations between crime lords about the station's future. Octaviana was unharmed. She had left the ship several minutes before the explosion... purely by chance. She opened a new bar on an asteroid previously known as the Liege's palace.

traits.locale_text: Kasballica Misyonu tarafından arka çıkılan Octaviana, yeni Binliman Emîri oldu. Adeptus Amasekus'taki prometyum tenekeleri, suç baronlarının istasyonun geleceğine dair yaptıkları görüşmeler sırasında kazayla patlayınca, liderliğine karşı çıkan herkes ölmüş oldu. Octaviana'ya bir şey olmadı. Gemiyi, patlamadan birkaç dakika önce terk etmişti. Tamamen tesadüf ederi. Eskiden Emîrin sarayı olarak bilinen asteroitte yeni bir bar açtı.
